Posted By: Rick McQuillan
Hello, I have 1890's Coffee Trade card for sale.  SOLD SOLD
The printing on the card says:

McLaughlin's XXXX Coffee
Copyright 1894
J. Ottman Litho Co NY

The card is in nearly perfect condition except for the writing on the back which says
"George Kester".

$35 shipped.

Thanks, Rick
